name: MET Location Forecast
description:
Weather forecasts for any location on earth.

This service delivers weather forecasts for any given coordinate for the next nine days, in JSON and (deprecated) XML formats. There are several variants with different parameters, with most data for the Nordic region.

For up-to-date precipitation forecasts, see our Nowcast service which is updated every five minures. The service is not suitable for forecasts above ground level. For aviation purposes, please see our IsobaricGRIB service.

When importing this API, please set `https://api.met.no` as URL when prompted.
